name: Cameron Romania
description: Cameron Romania is part of SLB, and is a world leader in drilling oil and gas equipment production. Cameron Romania is part of the Surface division specialized in production of wellhead, valves and trees. Currently, Cameron Romania has two production facilities: the older one in Câmpina (90km from Bucharest) and the new one in Ploiești city (60km from Bucharest).
